label: Mining
desc: The planet and its orbiting bodies are hollowed out by men in search of valuable materials.

label: Shipbuilding
desc: Giant shipyards float just above the atmosphere constructing all manner of spacebearing vessels

label: Computing
desc: Vast factories print line upon line of semiconductors, microchips and fibre cabling. Man-made caves of server banks calculate incomprehensible algorithims.

label: Foodstuffs
desc: From dank fungus farms to free range ranches; this planet creates a cornicopia of food.

label: Common Goods
desc: From cutlery to childrens toys, massive industrial lines produce commercial goods en masse.

label: Luxury Goods
desc: A network of workshops compete to outdo one another with the latest fashions, jewelries and consumer gadgets.

label: Nuclear Processing
desc: Under the watchful gaze of engineers nuclear reactors are built, fuel enriched and weapons constructed.

label: Research and Development
desc: Cutting edge technology is designed, built and tested here.

label: Medical Science
desc: The regrowth of a lost limb is a trifle on this planet. The latest drugs, medical robots and procedures are studied and distributed here.

label: Antimatter Production
desc: Antimatter engines require great expertise and rare materials to construct. This planet has the immense infrastructure needed to sustain such an industry.
